newsitem.title: USA: U.S. judge allows GM racketeering claim against VW.
newsitem.headline: U.S. judge allows GM racketeering claim against VW.

text.p: A federal judge Tuesday denied Volkswagen AG's motion to dismiss racketeering claims by General Motors Corp., opening the German automaker to potentially higher damages in GM's U.S. civil lawsuit.

U.S. District Judge Nancy Edmunds said in a written order that GM's complaint against VW adequately met the standard needed to proceed under the Racketeer Influenced and Corrupt Organizations Act (RICO).
